titles.title: Mattsu to Yanma to Moburi-san: Nanatsu no Hihou to Soratobu Oshiro
マッツとヤンマとモブリさん -七つの秘宝と空飛ぶお城-
Matsu, Yamma and Moburi: The Mystery of the Seven Gems and the Flying Castle

relatedanime.anime: Mattsu to Yanma to Moburi-san 2: Suigun Otakara to Nazotoki no Shimajima

anime.description: Mattsu and Yamma are two boys who live in Matsuyama. Their favourite pastime is looking for the "Seven Wonders of Matsuyama". One day, two men appear. What are the seven hidden gems that they seek? Moburi, a high school girl who is like an older sister to the boys, also gets caught up in the adventure as this thrilling story set in Matsuyama begins. Faced with all kinds of trouble, what will they choose for the future of their city? Source: Official site
